centerName: THE WILLIAM WOODWARD JR NURSERY SCHOOL
permitHolder: THE WILLIAM WOODWARD JR NURSERY SCHOOL

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Reinspection Required

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
infractions.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

infractions.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

infractions.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to conduct business and employment reference checks of staff/volunteers
Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records

violations.Violation Summary: Fire extinguishers observed not to be inspected or maintained at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Outdoor play area was observed not maintained nor free of hazards or nuisances at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection toxic substances observed improperly stored so as to result in the potential for exposure or contamination of facility surfaces
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to conduct and document monthly fire drills
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
Appropriate methods to maintain food prep area free of pests was not provided or maintained at time of inspection
